scripts.compile: truffle compile && cp build/contracts/FKC* ../kc-frontend/app/abi && cp build/contracts/FKC* ../kc-serverless/abi
scripts.start:ganache: docker run --name kc-ganache -d -p 8545:8545 ganache && truffle migrate --network development
